instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Move 'Powered by' section to the bottom of the page (footer area) with proper spacing (mt-auto).
2. Increase vertical spacing between the Logo/Title section and the Stats grid (use mb-10).
3. Increase spacing after the 'Get Started' button (use mb-10).
4. Replace emoji icons in Action Cards with Lucide React icons for a cleaner look.
5. Ensure the layout fits on a single mobile screen (approx 800px height) but allows scrolling if content expands.
6. Use the 'Manrope' font family for a modern app feel.
7. Implement the deep slate background with subtle emerald blobs as specified in the theme.
8. IMPORTANT: Preserve all functional logic (OTP sending, verification, state management). Only redesign the UI.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
